DOC.brief_summary: The original trial evaluate effectiveness Web-based program preventing postpartum depression . The site modify provide material condition .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Web-based Prevention Program Postpartum Depression
DOC.detailed_description: Depression mental health condition symptom sadness , inability feel pleasure , loss energy interfere person 's normal life . Postpartum depression type depression experience woman give birth child . In study intervention prevent postpartum depression adapt use Internet test . Administering depression-prevention program Internet several advantage : initial investment make develop program , cost lower treat patient ; online treatment accessible great number people give clinic ; participant may worry stigma associate mental health problem often feel comfortable seek information Internet . Previous research show symptom depression reduce Internet-based intervention , research examine intervention specifically postpartum depression . The program test study aim replace in-person mental health care—in fact , people sign serious depression direct in-person mental health care . Instead , program aim provide additional mental health service among range available option . The original trial two-arm pilot prevention postpartum depression trial compare Internet-based course call `` Mothers Babies/Mamás Bebés '' ( M & B ) informational material postpartum depression . In original trial , 1088 pregnant woman recruit randomized ( anticipate ) either condition . The study Website therefore modify participant consent participate receive material condition . We eliminate randomization procedure . As original study , participant allow enroll time pregnancy follow 6 month birth child , length participation vary 6 15 month . After undergo screen process , participant access Internet-based course call `` Mothers Babies/Mamás Bebés '' ( M & B ) informational material . The informational material include information postpartum depression depression may occur childbirth . All participant invite via email complete monthly assessment duration study . These assessment measure mood , depression , satisfaction assign intervention .
